thread.title: Four years on: Reeva Steenkamp's spirit remembered
thread.title_full: Four years on: Reeva Steenkamp's spirit remembered

title: Four years on: Reeva Steenkamp's spirit remembered
text:
Date My Family's Mdu Nyoni causes a 'stampede' among fans 
Hundreds of South Africans have remembered Reeva's spirit with a string of messages on Twitter. 
While the rest of the country celebrates Valentine's Day, this day will always bring sorrow for Reeva's parents, Barry and June. 
For the past four years Reeva's parents have visited the beach in Port Elizabeth to sprinkle rose petals in the ocean in her memory. It's something that Reeva's parents also do on her birthday. 
Reeva was shot and killed on February 14, 2013 by her then boyfriend and Paralympian, Oscar Pistorius. The disgraced athlete is currently serving a six-year jail sentence. 
Here's how South Africans have remembered Reeva... â€” Vuyolwethu Ngcukana (@vuyomse) February 14, 2017 In Memory Of Reeva Steenkamp #valentines pic.twitter.com/39wyLkSQgy
